alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Pine; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 9:39AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN AITKIN, NORTH CENTRAL PINE, SOUTH CENTRAL ST. LOUIS AND CARLTON COUNTIES THROUGH 1015 AM CDT... At 939 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Fond Du Lac Band Brookston Area, to 8 miles west of Kettle River, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cloquet, Hermantown, Scanlon, Carlton, Mahtowa, Barnum, Wrenshall, Cromwell, Kettle River, Thomson, Fond Du Lac Band Brookston Area, Fond Du Lac Band Cloquet Area, Nemadji, Fond Du Lac Band Sawyer Area, Mahnomen, Sturgeon Lake, Automba, Sawyer, Esko, and Kettle Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Pine; South Aitkin
